name: Bloo Venture (Garry)
description:
Bloo is a robot created in the 1112 laboratory. Bloo was created with the aim of researching "Satera Jontal". 

Satera Jontal is a traditional script from Sumbawa, West Nusa Tenggara. This script is used to write the Sumbawa language (basa samawa) which is spoken on the western part of the island of Sumbawa. The writing is in the form of symbols, where each symbol has its own meaning.

Now Bloo is in the simulation stage. Garry, the creator of Bloo said, "With this robot, I hope to bring the satera jontal back to life in this era,"

Credits:

https://asoftmurmur.com/ -- Ambient Sound

Andi Emirsyah Wicaksana -- Coding, Arts, and Musics

Message From Creator:

I made this game for the Devindo Game Jam 2! it's really fun joining this jam, i've never been so excited like this before. I give so much effort to these game, i hope i can win this jam, good luck for everyone who participate in these game jam too! 

I really hope by creating this game people will be interested about learning the Satera Jontal. One of the reason i made this is because i found out that not much people in Sumbawa know about Satera Jontal. These is my effort to spread the knowledge of Satera Jontal. yam mara leng tau samawa, lamen yong kita, sai bali? (like sumbawa people says, if it's not us, then who else?)

On the next update i will bring a lot more content to the game, such as boss, puzzles, and more! Stay tune~

If you have feedback please tell me in the comment, that will helping me so much!
Jika kau punya umpan balik, mohon tulis di kolom komentar, itu akan sangat membantu!
